00001 // Function written by B. Lachele Foley, 2007
00002 #include <mylib.h>
00003 #include <molecules.h>
00004 //#include "../inc/mylib.h"
00005 //#include "../inc/molecules.h"
00006 /****************** get_residue_COM() *********************/
00007 /* Finds the center of mass of the molecule and places it in the
00008  * appropriate location.  Similar functions exist for the other
00009  * structures.
00010  */
00011 coord_3D get_residue_COM(residue *r,atype *ATYPE, int xs){
00012 int ta=0;
00013 double tmm=0; 
00014 coord_3D c;
00015 // calculate the molecular weight 
00016 for(ta=0;ta<r[0].na;ta++){
00017         tmm+=ATYPE[r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00018         }
00019 //printf("the molecular weight is %f\n",tmm);
00020 if(tmm==0){mywhine("molecular weight of molecule %s is zero.\n(Have types/masses been assigned?");}
00021 r[0].m=tmm;
00022 
00023 c.i=0;
00024 c.j=0;
00025 c.k=0; 
00026 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00027 // calculate the center of mass
00028 if(xs==-1){
00029 for(ta=0;ta<r[0].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00030         c.i+=r[0].a[ta].x.i*ATYPE[r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00031         c.j+=r[0].a[ta].x.j*ATYPE[r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00032         c.k+=r[0].a[ta].x.k*ATYPE[r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00033         }
00034         }
00035 else{
00036 for(ta=0;ta<r[0].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00037         c.i+=r[0].a[ta].xa[xs].i*ATYPE[r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00038         c.j+=r[0].a[ta].xa[xs].j*ATYPE[r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00039         c.k+=r[0].a[ta].xa[xs].k*ATYPE[r[0].a[ta].t].m;
00040         }
00041         }
00042 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00043 c.i/=tmm;
00044 c.j/=tmm;
00045 c.k/=tmm; 
00046 //printf("center of mass is at: %20.12e %20.12e %20.12e \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00047 return c;
00048 }

00050 /****************** get_molecule_COM() *********************/
00051 /* Finds the center of mass of the molecule and places it in the
00052  * appropriate location.  Similar functions exist for the other
00053  * structures.
00054  */
00055 coord_3D get_molecule_COM(molecule *m,atype *ATYPE, int xs){
00056 int ta=0,tr=0;
00057 double tmm=0; 
00058 coord_3D c;
00059 // calculate the molecular weight 
00060 for(tr=0;tr<m[0].nr;tr++){
00061 for(ta=0;ta<m[0].r[tr].na;ta++){
00062         tmm+=ATYPE[m[0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00063         }
00064         }
00065 //printf("the molecular weight is %f\n",tmm);
00066 if(tmm==0){mywhine("molecular weight of molecule %s is zero.\n(Have types/masses been assigned?");}
00067 m[0].m=tmm;
00068 
00069 c.i=0;
00070 c.j=0;
00071 c.k=0; 
00072 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00073 // calculate the center of mass
00074 if(xs==-1){
00075 for(tr=0;tr<m[0].nr;tr++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00076 for(ta=0;ta<m[0].r[tr].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00077         c.i+=m[0].r[tr].a[ta].x.i*ATYPE[m[0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00078         c.j+=m[0].r[tr].a[ta].x.j*ATYPE[m[0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00079         c.k+=m[0].r[tr].a[ta].x.k*ATYPE[m[0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00080         }
00081         }
00082         }
00083 else {
00084 for(tr=0;tr<m[0].nr;tr++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00085 for(ta=0;ta<m[0].r[tr].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00086         c.i+=m[0].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].i*ATYPE[m[0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00087         c.j+=m[0].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].j*ATYPE[m[0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00088         c.k+=m[0].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].k*ATYPE[m[0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00089         }
00090         }
00091         }
00092 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00093 c.i/=tmm;
00094 c.j/=tmm;
00095 c.k/=tmm; 
00096 //printf("center of mass is at: %20.12e %20.12e %20.12e \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00097 return c;
00098 }

00100 /****************** get_assembly_COM() *********************/
00101 /* Finds the center of mass of the molecule and places it in the
00102  * appropriate location.  Similar functions exist for the other
00103  * structures.
00104  */
00105 coord_3D get_assembly_COM(assembly *a,atype *ATYPE, int xs){
00106 int ta=0,tr=0,tm=0;
00107 double tmm=0; 
00108 coord_3D c;
00109 // calculate the molecular weight 
00110 for(tm=0;tm<a[0].nm;tm++){
00111 for(tr=0;tr<a[0].m[tm][0].nr;tr++){
00112 for(ta=0;ta<a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].na;ta++){
00113         tmm+=ATYPE[a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00114         }
00115         }
00116         }
00117 //printf("the molecular weight is %f\n",tmm);
00118 if(tmm==0){mywhine("molecular weight of molecule %s is zero.\n(Have types/masses been assigned?");}
00119 a[0].mass=tmm;
00120 
00121 c.i=0;
00122 c.j=0;
00123 c.k=0; 
00124 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00125 // calculate the center of mass
00126 if(xs==-1){
00127 for(tm=0;tm<a[0].nm;tm++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00128 for(tr=0;tr<a[0].m[tm][0].nr;tr++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00129 for(ta=0;ta<a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00130         c.i+=a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].x.i*ATYPE[a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00131         c.j+=a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].x.j*ATYPE[a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00132         c.k+=a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].x.k*ATYPE[a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00133         }
00134         }
00135         }
00136         }
00137 else {
00138 for(tm=0;tm<a[0].nm;tm++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00139 for(tr=0;tr<a[0].m[tm][0].nr;tr++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00140 for(ta=0;ta<a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00141         c.i+=a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].i*ATYPE[a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00142         c.j+=a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].j*ATYPE[a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00143         c.k+=a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].k*ATYPE[a[0].m[tm][0].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00144         }
00145         }
00146         }
00147         }
00148 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00149 c.i/=tmm;
00150 c.j/=tmm;
00151 c.k/=tmm; 
00152 //printf("center of mass is at: %20.12e %20.12e %20.12e \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00153 return c;
00154 }

00156 /****************** get_ensemble_COM() *********************/
00157 /* Finds the center of mass of the molecule and places it in the
00158  * appropriate location.  Similar functions exist for the other
00159  * structures.
00160  * NOTE!!  Assemblies within ensembles are assumed to be redundant.
00161  *      That is, the molecules in the ensemble are also represented
00162  *      within the assemblies (copying the molecule pointers keeps 
00163  *      the data from taking extra space).  So, when calculating the
00164  *      center of mass for the ensemble, this function ONLY considers
00165  *      molecules and not assemblies.
00166  */
00167 coord_3D get_ensemble_COM(ensemble *e,atype *ATYPE, int xs){
00168 int ta=0,tr=0,tm=0;
00169 double tmm=0; 
00170 coord_3D c;
00171 // calculate the molecular weight 
00172 for(tm=0;tm<e[0].nm;tm++){
00173 for(tr=0;tr<e[0].m[tm].nr;tr++){
00174 for(ta=0;ta<e[0].m[tm].r[tr].na;ta++){
00175         tmm+=ATYPE[e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00176         }
00177         }
00178         }
00179 //printf("the molecular weight is %f\n",tmm);
00180 if(tmm==0){mywhine("molecular weight of molecule %s is zero.\n(Have types/masses been assigned?");}
00181 e[0].mass=tmm;
00182 
00183 c.i=0;
00184 c.j=0;
00185 c.k=0; 
00186 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00187 // calculate the center of mass
00188 if(xs==-1){
00189 for(tm=0;tm<e[0].nm;tm++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00190 for(tr=0;tr<e[0].m[tm].nr;tr++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00191 for(ta=0;ta<e[0].m[tm].r[tr].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00192         c.i+=e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].x.i*ATYPE[e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00193         c.j+=e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].x.j*ATYPE[e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00194         c.k+=e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].x.k*ATYPE[e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00195         }
00196         }
00197         }
00198         }
00199 else {
00200 for(tm=0;tm<e[0].nm;tm++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00201 for(tr=0;tr<e[0].m[tm].nr;tr++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00202 for(ta=0;ta<e[0].m[tm].r[tr].na;ta++){ // COM = sum(m_i * r_i) / sum(m_i)
00203         c.i+=e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].i*ATYPE[e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00204         c.j+=e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].j*ATYPE[e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00205         c.k+=e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].xa[xs].k*ATYPE[e[0].m[tm].r[tr].a[ta].t].m;
00206         }
00207         }
00208         }
00209         }
00210 //printf("center of mass is at: %f %f %f \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00211 c.i/=tmm;
00212 c.j/=tmm;
00213 c.k/=tmm; 
00214 //printf("center of mass is at: %20.12e %20.12e %20.12e \n",m[0].COM.i,m[0].COM.j,m[0].COM.k);
00215 return c;
00216 }
